DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly assign intervention group ( IG ) control group ( CG ) . The IG train three time per week indoor bicycle 60 75 % maximal heartrate aim weekly total 17.5kcal/kg bodyweight 6 consecutive week . The exercise take place supervision . CG absolve basic stretch mobilisation program 3 time per week , also supervision 6 consecutive week . At end every week physical fitness evaluate queens step test . No activity moderate high intensity allow throughout intervention time . All patient participate multimodal treatment program depression ward , include pharmacotherapy , psychotherapy specialize therapy art therapy ergotherapy .
